summary: Berlin after the Wall came down. Observations on radical reconstruction of a city core. Images of the conflict between the thirst for demolition and the hunger for completion.
cast: Günter Behnisch|Werner Durth|Helmut Jahn|Josef Paul Kleihues|Hans Kollhoff|Rem Koolhaas|I.M. Pei|Renzo Piano|Axel Schultes|Angela Winkler
title: Berlin Babylon
